Token.Abstract: The AFIncrementalStoreHTTPClient protocol defines the methods used by the HTTP client to interract with the associated web services of an AFIncrementalStore.
Returns an NSDictionary or an NSArray of NSDictionaries containing the representations of the resources found in a response object.

Parameter.Name: entity
Parameter.Abstract: The entity represented

Parameter.Name: responseObject
Parameter.Abstract: The response object returned from the server.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An NSDictionary with the representation or an NSArray of NSDictionaries containing the resource representations.

Token.Abstract: Returns an NSDictionary containing the representations of associated objects found within the representation of a response object, keyed by their relationship name.

Parameter.Name: representation
Parameter.Abstract: The resource representation.

Parameter.Name: entity
Parameter.Abstract: The entity for the representation.

Parameter.Name: response
Parameter.Abstract: The HTTP response for the resource request.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An NSDictionary containing representations of relationships, keyed by relationship name.

Token.Abstract: Returns the resource identifier for the resource whose representation of an entity came from the specified HTTP response. A resource identifier is a string that uniquely identifies a particular resource among all resource types. If new attributes come back for an existing resource identifier, the managed object associated with that resource identifier will be updated, rather than a new object being created.

Parameter.Name: representation
Parameter.Abstract: The resource representation.

Parameter.Name: entity
Parameter.Abstract: The entity for the representation.

Parameter.Name: response
Parameter.Abstract: The HTTP response for the resource request.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An NSString resource identifier for the resource.

Token.Abstract: Returns the attributes for the managed object corresponding to the representation of an entity from the specified response. This method is used to get the attributes of the managed object from its representation returned in -representationOrArrayOfRepresentationsFromResponseObject or representationsForRelationshipsFromRepresentation:ofEntity:fromResponse:.

Parameter.Name: representation
Parameter.Abstract: The resource representation.

Parameter.Name: entity
Parameter.Abstract: The entity for the representation.

Parameter.Name: response
Parameter.Abstract: The HTTP response for the resource request.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An NSDictionary containing the attributes for a managed object.

Token.Abstract: Returns a URL request object for the specified fetch request within a particular managed object context.

Parameter.Name: fetchRequest
Parameter.Abstract: The fetch request to translate into a URL request.

Parameter.Name: context
Parameter.Abstract: The managed object context executing the fetch request.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An NSURLRequest object corresponding to the specified fetch request.

Token.Abstract: Returns a URL request object with a given HTTP method for a particular managed object. This method is used in AFIncrementalStore -newValuesForObjectWithID:withContext:error.

Parameter.Name: method
Parameter.Abstract: The HTTP method of the request.

Parameter.Name: objectID
Parameter.Abstract: The object ID for the specified managed object.

Parameter.Name: context
Parameter.Abstract: The managed object context for the managed object.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An NSURLRequest object with the provided HTTP method for the resource corresponding to the managed object.

Token.Abstract: Returns a URL request object with a given HTTP method for a particular relationship of a given managed object. This method is used in AFIncrementalStore -newValueForRelationship:forObjectWithID:withContext:error:.

Parameter.Name: method
Parameter.Abstract: The HTTP method of the request.

Parameter.Name: relationship
Parameter.Abstract: The relationship of the specifified managed object

Parameter.Name: objectID
Parameter.Abstract: The object ID for the specified managed object.

Parameter.Name: context
Parameter.Abstract: The managed object context for the managed object.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An NSURLRequest object with the provided HTTP method for the resource or resoures corresponding to the relationship of the managed object.

Token.Abstract: Returns the attributes representation of an entity from the specified managed object. This method is used to get the attributes of the representation from its managed object.

Parameter.Name: attributes
Parameter.Abstract: The resource representation.

Parameter.Name: managedObject
Parameter.Abstract: The NSManagedObject for the representation.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An NSDictionary containing the attributes for a representation, based on the given managed object.

Token.Abstract: Returns whether the client should fetch remote attribute values for a particular managed object. This method is consulted when a managed object faults on an attribute, and will call requestWithMethod:pathForObjectWithID:withContext: if YES.

Parameter.Name: objectID
Parameter.Abstract: The object ID for the specified managed object.

Parameter.Name: context
Parameter.Abstract: The managed object context for the managed object.

ReturnValue.Abstract: YES if an HTTP request should be made, otherwise `NO.

Token.Abstract: Returns whether the client should fetch remote relationship values for a particular managed object. This method is consulted when a managed object faults on a particular relationship, and will call requestWithMethod:pathForRelationship:forObjectWithID:withContext: if YES.

Parameter.Name: relationship
Parameter.Abstract: The relationship of the specifified managed object

Parameter.Name: objectID
Parameter.Abstract: The object ID for the specified managed object.

Parameter.Name: context
Parameter.Abstract: The managed object context for the managed object.

ReturnValue.Abstract: YES if an HTTP request should be made, otherwise `NO.
